@BobHausvik Banker's Life has a not recommended rating from several sources. If you have an issue with them, contact the agent or the department of insurance https://t.co/gVuPhZ42Wx

@BobHausvik Claims not approved either did not meet the benefit trigger, information was not provided, or were asking for benefits not listed in the policy. I always recommend working with the top A rated companies and a specialist to help you find the right coverage with the right company

@BobHausvik Not to defend them but online complaints are not representative of real life. The report shows that the vast majority of LTC Insurance claims are paid. That has been my personal experience as well. If you have an issue, contact the agent and the Dept of Insurance.
